column4: when y'all get done with that, i have a question about x11 forwarding and i'm not even sure how to google about it: i ssh -Y from my hardy box into another box (fedora) and try to run firefox. i get firefox running on my local machine, not the remote machine. is ubuntu trying to outsmart me?
lol, means your probably not connected to the remote machine when you issue the command
thanks but i'm pretty sure i'm not that tired. prompt shows other hostname and ifconfig shows ip info expected on remote machine
